sn55.34:1.2: “Cattarimani, bhikkhave, devanam devapadani avisuddhanam sattanam visuddhiya apariyodatanam sattanam pariyodapanaya.
sn55.34:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti—
sn55.34:2.3: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.34:2.4: Idam pathamam devanam devapadam avisuddhanam sattanam visuddhiya apariyodatanam sattanam pariyodapanaya.
sn55.34:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ariyasavako ariyakantehi silehi samannagato hoti akhandehi …pe… samadhisamvattanikehi.
sn55.34:4.2: Idam catuttham devanam devapadam avisuddhanam sattanam visuddhiya apariyodatanam sattanam pariyodapanaya.
sn55.34:4.3: Imani kho, bhikkhave, cattari devanam devapadani avisuddhanam sattanam visuddhiya apariyodatanam sattanam pariyodapanaya”ti.
